response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that I believe could significantly enhance your life or business. Given its significance, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an exclusive chance to own something truly exceptional at a fraction of its true worth. I trust this offer will be appealing to you, considering the unparalleled quality and potential benefits the product can bring. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 950000}
